name: Premium Wireless Headphones
description: High-quality wireless headphones with noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and premium sound quality. Perfect for music lovers and professionals.

name: Smart Fitness Watch
description: Advanced fitness tracking watch with heart rate monitor, GPS, and 7-day battery life. Track your workouts and stay connected.

name: Organic Cotton T-Shirt
description: Comfortable organic cotton t-shirt made from sustainable materials. Available in multiple colors and sizes.

name: Ceramic Coffee Mug
description: Handcrafted ceramic coffee mug with a comfortable grip. Microwave and dishwasher safe. Perfect for your morning brew.

name: Leather Crossbody Bag
description: Genuine leather crossbody bag with adjustable strap and multiple compartments. Perfect for everyday use.

name: Wireless Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with 360-degree sound and waterproof design. Perfect for outdoor adventures.

name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: Insulated stainless steel water bottle that keeps drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours. BPA-free.

name: Denim Jacket
description: Classic denim jacket with a modern fit. Made from premium denim with comfortable stretch fabric.

name: Smartphone Stand
description: Adjustable smartphone stand made from aluminum. Perfect for video calls, watching content, or hands-free use.

name: Yoga Mat
description: Non-slip yoga mat made from eco-friendly materials. Perfect thickness for comfort and stability during practice.

name: Wireless Charging Pad
description: Fast wireless charging pad compatible with all Qi-enabled devices. Sleek design with LED indicator.

name: Sunglasses
description: Polarized sunglasses with UV400 protection. Lightweight frame with comfortable fit for all-day wear.

name: Portable Power Bank
description: 20000mAh portable power bank with fast charging capability. Charges multiple devices simultaneously.

name: Running Shoes
description: Lightweight running shoes with responsive cushioning and breathable mesh upper. Perfect for daily runs.

name: Laptop Sleeve
description: Padded laptop sleeve with water-resistant exterior. Fits laptops up to 15 inches with extra storage pocket.

name: Essential Oil Diffuser
description: Ultrasonic essential oil diffuser with LED mood lighting. Large capacity tank for extended use.

name: Kitchen Knife Set
description: Professional kitchen knife set with wooden block. Includes chef knife, paring knife, and utility knife.

name: Plant Pot Set
description: Set of 3 ceramic plant pots with drainage holes. Perfect for indoor plants and succulents.

name: Bluetooth Earbuds
description: True wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation and 8-hour battery life. Includes charging case.

name: Desk Lamp
description: Adjustable LED desk lamp with touch controls and multiple brightness levels. Perfect for work or study.

name: Backpack
description: Durable backpack with laptop compartment and multiple pockets. Water-resistant material for daily use.

name: Coffee Maker
description: Programmable coffee maker with 12-cup capacity and auto-shutoff feature. Perfect for coffee lovers.

name: Phone Case
description: Protective phone case with shock-absorbing design. Available for iPhone and Samsung models.

name: Throw Pillow
description: Decorative throw pillow with removable cover. Made from soft, durable fabric in various patterns.

name: Gaming Mouse
description: High-precision gaming mouse with customizable RGB lighting and programmable buttons.

name: Candle Set
description: Set of 3 scented candles in glass jars. Long-burning with natural soy wax and cotton wicks.

name: Wall Clock
description: Modern wall clock with silent movement and clean design. Perfect for any room decor.

name: Hair Dryer
description: Professional hair dryer with ionic technology and multiple heat settings. Includes concentrator and diffuser.

name: Puzzle Set
description: 1000-piece jigsaw puzzle with beautiful artwork. Perfect for family entertainment and relaxation.

name: Bath Towel Set
description: Set of 4 luxury bath towels made from 100% cotton. Soft, absorbent, and quick-drying.

name: Blender
description: High-speed blender with 6-cup capacity and multiple speed settings. Perfect for smoothies and food prep.

name: Picture Frame
description: Elegant picture frame with glass front and wooden border. Available in multiple sizes.

name: Wireless Keyboard
description: Slim wireless keyboard with quiet keys and long battery life. Compatible with all devices.

name: Scented Soap Set
description: Set of 6 handmade soaps with natural ingredients and delightful fragrances. Perfect gift set.

name: Tablet Stand
description: Adjustable tablet stand with multiple viewing angles. Made from durable aluminum.

name: Wine Glass Set
description: Set of 4 crystal wine glasses with elegant design. Perfect for entertaining and special occasions.

description: Set of 5 resistance bands with different resistance levels. Includes carrying bag and exercise guide.

name: Desk Organizer
description: Multi-compartment desk organizer with slots for pens, paper clips, and other office supplies.

name: Bedside Lamp
description: Touch-controlled bedside lamp with warm LED lighting. Perfect for reading and ambient lighting.

description: Bamboo cutting board with juice groove and non-slip feet. Large size perfect for meal prep.

description: Adjustable phone tripod with Bluetooth remote. Perfect for photos, videos, and video calls.

description: RGB mechanical keyboard with tactile switches and customizable lighting effects.

description: Lavender aromatherapy candle in a beautiful glass jar. Promotes relaxation and stress relief.

description: Digital alarm clock with large display and multiple alarm settings. Includes USB charging port.

description: Professional curling iron with adjustable temperature settings and ceramic barrel.

name: Board Game
description: Family board game with strategy elements. Perfect for game nights and family bonding.

description: Set of 6 hand towels with decorative patterns. Made from soft, absorbent cotton.

description: 8-cup food processor with multiple attachments. Perfect for chopping, slicing, and pureeing.

name: Photo Album
description: Beautiful photo album with acid-free pages. Holds 200 photos with decorative cover.
